column5: Just thought i'd share this with y'all  got my baby boy a new hat!
With all that gore on his face ya shoulda had him holding a headless fish carcass.  JF
Thats not Gore That's Lunch.... Nice picture
Thanks for sharing Simon!!!  Looks real good on him Jacques
Great hat on a great little guy!
I got a flyer from the Ontario out doors magazine and they had a few baby stuff like this pretty cool
I love the hat Simon and the grin on his face
Thanks for all the kind replies guys, the little guy is just such a character, he rocks my world.
